Title: The Death Stick
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), Brooke Wied, Brooke Wied (staff writer)
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: Robert and Sol begin therapy. Grace and Frankie gets a surprise when they bring gifts to a fan of their vibrators. Brianna's nemesis makes an offer.
